abstract: Germany, under strain from accepting hundreds of thousands of refugees amid migrant crisis, is sending home people who have traveled from poor but safe countries to seek work; 10,000 were repatriated from January to July and pace is accelerating; new nationalist mood is discouraging so-called economic migrants.
lead_paragraph: Berlin has put in place a system for sending home people who have come from poor but safe countries to seek jobs.

headline.main: Migrants in Germany Fleeing Poverty Find Only a Ticket Home
headline.print_headline: Germany Gives a Ticket Home to Job Seekers

snippet: Berlin has put in place a system for sending home people who have come from poor but safe countries to seek jobs.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject
